wikipedia_page.main:
Jozef Edward Blochel (born 3 March 1962) in Chalfont St Giles, Buckinghamshire, is an English retired professional footballer who played as a winger for Wimbledon in the Football League.
Blochel joined Southampton as an associate schoolboy in September 1975, signing as a professional in March 1980, but failed to break into the first-team. He joined Wimbledon on loan in January 1982, before being released by "the Saints".After a few years in Scandinavia, he returned to England to play lower league football, before settling in Scandinavia.
